trans-unit.source: Configures the <xref uid="langword_csharp_caching" name="caching" href=""></xref> group within a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref uid="langword_csharp_caching" name="caching" href=""></xref>群組組態檔內。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The SystemWebCachingSectionGroup class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the `caching` section of a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: SystemWebCachingSectionGroup 類別可用來以程式設計方式存取和修改`caching`組態檔區段。

trans-unit.source: The SystemWebCachingSectionGroup class and the `caching` section provide centralized control of the caching mechanism for a site or application.
trans-unit.target: SystemWebCachingSectionGroup 類別和`caching`> 一節提供集中的控制的網站或應用程式的快取機制。

trans-unit.source: This makes it possible for caching to be deployed, modified, and disabled without modifying individual pages in the application.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓快取來部署、 修改，而且停用，而不需修改應用程式中的個別頁面。

trans-unit.source: The ASP.NET caching mechanism is implemented by the <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache> class.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 快取機制被藉由<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache>類別。</xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Caching Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) The following list describes the two types of caching ASP.NET provides.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 快取概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)下列清單將描述兩種類型的快取 ASP.NET 提供。

trans-unit.source: - The first is called output caching, which allows you to store dynamic page and user control responses.
trans-unit.target: -第一個稱為輸出快取，可讓您將儲存動態網頁和使用者控制項的回應。

trans-unit.source: On subsequent requests, the page or user control code is not executed; the cached output is used to satisfy the request.
trans-unit.target: 在後續要求中，不會執行網頁或使用者控制項程式碼;快取的輸出用來滿足要求。

trans-unit.source: You can access output caching settings using the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.OutputCache%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.OutputCacheSettings%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以存取使用的輸出快取設定<xref:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.OutputCache%2A>和<xref:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.OutputCacheSettings%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.OutputCacheSettings%2A> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.OutputCache%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The second type of caching is traditional application data caching, which you can use to programmatically store arbitrary objects to server memory so your application can save the time and resources it takes to recreate them.
trans-unit.target: 快取-第二種是傳統的應用程式資料快取，您可以使用來以程式設計方式儲存任意伺服器記憶體的物件，以便儲存您的應用程式的時間和重新建立它們所需的資源。

trans-unit.source: You can access these cache settings using the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.Cache%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以存取使用這些快取設定<xref:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.Cache%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.Cache%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The SystemWebCachingSectionGroup constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: SystemWebCachingSectionGroup 建構函式不是直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system.
trans-unit.target: 它會呼叫 ASP.NET 組態系統。

trans-unit.source: You obtain an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup> class by using the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 取得執行個體<xref:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup>類別使用<xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A>方法。</xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_cache" name="cache" href=""></xref> section contained within the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref uid="langword_csharp_cache" name="cache" href=""></xref>組態內所包含的區段。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection> object refers to the `cache` section of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection>物件是指`cache`組態檔區段。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection> class to modify the `cache` section programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection>類別以修改`cache`區段以程式設計的方式。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection"> </xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_outputCache" name="outputCache" href=""></xref> section contained within the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref uid="langword_csharp_outputCache" name="outputCache" href=""></xref>組態內所包含的區段。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSection> object refers to the `outputCache` section of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSection>物件是指`outputCache`組態檔區段。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSection"> </xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_outputCacheSettings" name="outputCacheSettings" href=""></xref> section contained within the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref uid="langword_csharp_outputCacheSettings" name="outputCacheSettings" href=""></xref>組態內所包含的區段。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection> object refers to the `outputCacheSettings` section of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection>物件是指`outputCacheSettings`組態檔區段。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection>

trans-unit.source: The output cache settings enable or disable disk-based persistent output cache, define the location for persisting the data to be cached, and specify the maximum size of the cache per application.
trans-unit.target: 輸出快取設定會啟用或停用磁碟為基礎的永續性輸出快取、 定義的位置將資料保存到快取，並指定每個應用程式快取的大小上限的資料。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET allows you to cache multiple versions of a page response declaratively by using attributes of the directive and programmatically using the properties and methods of the <xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy> class.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 可讓您以宣告方式快取的頁面回應多個版本，使用指示詞的屬性，並以程式設計方式使用的屬性和方法的<xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy>類別。</xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy>

trans-unit.source: You can achieve the same results by configuring the application using the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection> or the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile> type.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定應用程式使用，以達到相同的結果<xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection>或<xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile>型別。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection"> </xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_sqlCacheDependency" name="sqlCacheDependency" href=""></xref> section contained within the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref uid="langword_csharp_sqlCacheDependency" name="sqlCacheDependency" href=""></xref>組態內所包含的區段。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencySection> object refers to the `sqlCacheDependency` section of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencySection>物件是指`sqlCacheDependency`組態檔區段。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencySection>

trans-unit.source: The SQL cache dependency establishes a relationship between an item stored in an ASP.NET application's cache and a specific SQL Server database table.
trans-unit.target: SQL 快取相依性會建立儲存在 ASP.NET 應用程式的快取和特定的 SQL Server 資料庫資料表中的項目之間的關聯性。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency> class must monitor the table so that when the table changes the item will be automatically removed from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體<xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency>類別必須監視資料表，以便在變更資料表時將從快取自動移除項目。</xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencySection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencySection"> </xref>物件。
